alfredsnippet.snippet:
## bar
# style bar does not highlight lowest values in each columns.
# colors = ['red','green'] gives neg red. width is cell width.
# align is default left and does not hightlight lowest, but align=mid hightlights all.
df.style.bar(color=['#d65f5f', '#5fba7d'],width=90,align='mid')
alfredsnippet.name: pandas stylying bar
